.setDescription.spanish:
`🫡` ¡Hola! Y bienvenido al panel de ajustes de <@${app.id}>.
Si necesitas ayuda con alguna función o tienes dudas, únete a nosotros en nuestro [servidor de soporte](https:/dsc.gg/Coroa).
.setDescription.english:
`🫡` Hello! And welcome to the setting panel of <@${app.id}>.
If you need help with any function or have doubts, join us in our [support server](https:/dsc.gg/Coroa).

.setDescriptionColor.spanish: Elige un color del selector con el cual se mostrarán los mensajes embeds.
.setDescriptionColor.english: Choose a color from the selector to be used for the embed messages.

.setDescriptionLang.spanish: Elige el idioma del selector con el cual <@${app.id}> responderá.
.setDescriptionLang.english: Choose the language in which <@${app.id}> will respond.

.setDescriptionStaffRole.spanish: Elige el rol(es) de administrador del selector.
.setDescriptionStaffRole.english: Choose the role(s) of the administrator from the selector.

.setDescriptionBlockChannel.spanish: <@${app.id}> no responderá a los comandos en los canales bloqueados a menos que el usuario tenga permisos de administrador o roles específicos.
.setDescriptionBlockChannel.english: <@${app.id}> won't respond to commands in blocked channels unless the user has administrator permissions or specific roles.

error.spanish: > `🚨` Hubo un error mientras se configuraba <@${app.id}>.
error.english: > `🚨` There was an error while configuring <@${app.id}>.

error.spanish: > `🚨` Hubo un error consiguiendo la información del miembro.
error.english: > `🚨` There was an error while fetching the member information.

error.spanish: > `🚨` Hubo un error consiguiendo la información del servidor.
error.english: > `🚨` There was an error while fetching the server information.

thirdWarn.spanish: > `⛔` <@${userWarn.id}> ha sido baneado al recibir `${warnRecord?.settings?.warns}` avisos.
thirdWarn.english: > `⛔` <@${userWarn.id}> has been banned because he received `${warnRecord?.settings?.warns}` warnings.

error.spanish: > `⚠️` Hubo un error al procesar el aviso.
error.english: > `⚠️` An error occurred while processing the warning.

warnDelete.spanish: El aviso **${warningIndexInt + 1}** ha sido eliminado. <@${userId}> ahora tiene ``${warnRecord.settings?.warns}`` aviso.
warnDelete.english: Warning **${warningIndexInt + 1}** has been removed. <@${userId}> now has ``${warnRecord.settings?.warns}`` warning.

noWarn.spanish: El aviso **${warningIndexInt + 1}** ha sido eliminado. <@${userId}> ya no tiene avisos.
noWarn.english: Warning **${warningIndexInt + 1}** has been removed. <@${userId}> now has no warnings.

noWarns.spanish: > `❌` No se encontraron avisos para este usuario.
noWarns.english: > `❌` No warnings found for this user.

genError.spanish: > `⚠️` Hubo un error al encontrar los avisos.
genError.english: > `⚠️` An error occurred while fetching warnings.

updateError.spanish: > `⚠️` Hubo un error al actualizar los detalles de los avisos.
updateError.english: > `⚠️` An error occurred while updating warning details.

MessageDelete.spanish: > `⛔` <@${userBan.id}> ha sido vetado y se han borrado sus mensajes porque: `${reason}`.
MessageDelete.english: > `⛔` <@${userBan.id}> has been banned and his/her messages has been deleted because: `${reason}`.

errorBan.spanish: Hubo un fallo al vetar y borrar los mensajes del usuario.
errorBan.english: Failed to ban the user and delete messages.

errorUser.spanish: El usuario especificado no pudo ser encontrado en el servidor.
errorUser.english: The specified user was not found in this server.
